gameDetails.name: Lanterns: The Harvest Festival â€“ Game Boy Geek Promo Tile
gameDetails.description:
A promo tile originally available as a reward through the Season 4 Game Boy Geek Kickstarter campaign.

The player receives one Lantern Card corresponding to the color on the side of the Lake Tile the player is facing (either black or red). Other players will receive Lantern Cards in a clockwise fashion as long as the supply hasn't been exhausted.

This tile also features a platform so any platform bonuses will be applied first.
